mapper.select: select * from activity_log where to_email = #{email} and rownum <= 30

select seq_photo, kind, readyn, a.nickname to_nickname, b.nickname from_nickname, b.email from_email, b.profile from_profile, a.email to_email from activity_log, member a, member b where activity_log.to_email = #{email} and a.email = activity_log.to_email and activity_log.from_email = b.email order by activity_log.reg_date desc

select seq_photo, kind, readyn, b.nickname from_nickname, c.nickname to_nickname, b.email from_email, b.profile from_profile from activity_log, (select follow.to_email email from member, follow where member.email = follow.from_email and member.email = #{email}) a, member b, member c where activity_log.from_email = a.email and a.email = b.email and activity_log.to_email = c.email order by activity_log.reg_date desc
